subtitle: hi I'm Simon Jacobson and this is
meaningful Monday's where we answer your
personal questions the question of this
week is about sibling rivalry I know
it's normal for siblings to fight but
two of my daughters seemed to take it to
the next level they're competitive and
just plain mean to each other it was bad
when they were younger but we figured
they would grow out of it they are
gentle and sweet to others but they
unveil a cruelty in each other that is
hurtful and scary and it seems only to
be getting worse what can I do first
thing is to establish of there any
factors at home or at school that may be
causing this animosity it may not even
be between the siblings themselves it
could be parental preferences sometimes
school difficulties that one of them or
both of them are going through something
with their friends so you really have to
go through the usual suspects so to
speak and identify or look to identify
what can be a factor that is causing
this type of inconsistent behavior you
say they're nice to others but not to
each other additionally are there
incentives that you can offer that would
make them be closer sometimes you use an
incentive something that they really
want it's critical to nip it in the bud
and not allow it to escalate because
they're going to grow into adults and
you don't want to have a situation where
sisters simply don't speak to each other
or worse but there's always factors with
the smoke this fire when you see
siblings have that type of attitude to
each other it's usually due to factor
that we're not identifying as of yet and
it's critical to discover what that is
someone may have hurt one of those girls
they may have been molested they may be
madder than people maybe don't want to
talk or hear about but when there is a
inconsistency like that rest assured
that some erratic behavior always as a
result of some underlying psychological
imbalance and it's incumbent upon
parents love their children to figure
out what it is in a sensitive way in a
kind way in a giving way and not
obviously in a critical or judgmental
way so you really have to understand the
pathology and the whole environment to
be able to understand what is going on
with
particular siblings god bless you that
you find the answers and find that
clarity to help them discover the
strengths in each other and learn to
love each other because in some ways
sibling love is the deepest love of all
is that unconditional connection that
children that siblings brothers and
sisters have with each other that can
help them endure any challenge in life
this has been meaningful Monday's if
you'd like to submit your own personal
question please click on the link below
everyone have a very meaningful week
